item.title: Papal conclave, process to elect next pope, begins at the Vatican
item.description: The papal conclave, the secretive election process to elect the next leader of the Roman Catholic Church, commences on Wednesday.

item.title: Papal conclave live updates: Cardinals gather at Vatican to elect next pope
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican to elect the successor to Pope Francis, who died on April 21.

item.title: 4 women file lawsuit accusing Smokey Robinson of rape and sexual assault
item.description: Lawyers for four former housekeepers of Smokey Robinson filed a lawsuit against the singer and his wife on Tuesday.

item.title: Biden calls Trump's pressure on Ukraine 'modern-day appeasement' in interview
item.description: Former President Joe Biden has said in his first interview since leaving the White House that President Donald Trump's pressure on Ukraine to give up ...

item.title: Trump plans to announce the US will call Persian Gulf the Arabian Gulf, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump plans to announce next week that the U.S. will refer to the Persian Gulf as the Arabian Gulf or the Gulf of Arabia
